alert.note: Alert for Lower Lafourche; Lower Terrebonne; St. Charles; St. John The Baptist; Upper Lafourche; Upper Terrebonne (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 25 at 11:12AM CST by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF SOUTH CENTRAL ST. JOHN THE BAPTIST, ST. CHARLES, EASTERN TERREBONNE AND NORTHEASTERN LAFOURCHE PARISHES THROUGH 1145 AM CST... At 1111 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles northeast of Raceland to near Lockport to near Dulac. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Houma, Cut Off, Larose, Hahnville, Galliano, Lockport, Mathews, Paradis, Des Allemands, Chauvin, Dulac, Luling, Boutte, Raceland, Ama, Bayou Gauche, Montegut, Cocodrie, St. Rose, and Destrehan. This includes Interstate 310 between mile markers 4 and 11. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Lower Lafourche; Lower Terrebonne; St. Charles; St. John The Baptist; Upper Lafourche; Upper Terrebonne
